color.description: Customize the color of the dots

count.description: The displayed number is displayed as '${overflowCount}+' when it is greater than overflowCount, and is hidden when it is 0
count.description_zh: 展示的数字，大于 overflowCount 时显示为 `${overflowCount}+`，为 0 时隐藏

dot.description: No numbers are displayed, just a small red dot
dot.description_zh: 不展示数字，只有一个小红点

:numberStyle.description: Sets the style of the status point

:offset.description: Set the position offset of the status point in the format [x, y]
:offset.description_zh: 设置状态点的位置偏移，格式为 [x, y]

showZero.description: When the value is 0, whether to display the badge
showZero.description_zh: 当数值为 0 时，是否展示 Badge

status.description: Set Badge to the status point
status.description_zh: 设置 Badge 为状态点

text.description: Valid under the premise that 'status' is set, and the text of the status point is set
text.description_zh: 在设置了 `status` 的前提下有效，设置状态点的文本

title.description: Sets the text that appears when the mouse is placed on a status point
title.description_zh: 设置鼠标放在状态点上时显示的文字
